body_html:
So not really a solution, but one thing to try is to try is CUDA 8 and
CuDNN 5.0
Last week I've been re-building with this configuration daily with no
problems

On Sun, Aug 14, 2016 at 9:20 AM, David Crook notifications@github.com
wrote:

I would suspect its CUDA 8 or CuDNN 5.1.5 I'm not really familiar with
either right now to make an educated assessment.
